flavor: You spent your youth as a deckhand in Balic’s fleet of silt schooners, working the trade routes in the Estuary of the Forked Tongue, the Silt Archipelago, and sometimes as far away as the Road of Fire. Traveling the Sea of Silt is dangerous—you have fought off giants and silt horrors and endured terrible dust storms. Why did you leave your last ship? Do you hope to buy your own vessel someday?
name: Balic - Silt Sailor
